name: non-zone
description: Non-Zone is the global map for experiential and solo-travelers

scripts.deploy:dev: source .env.dev && REACT_APP_NONZONE_ENV='development' yarn --cwd webapp build && firebase deploy -P default
scripts.deploy:prod: source .env.prod && REACT_APP_NONZONE_ENV='production' yarn --cwd webapp build && firebase deploy -P production
scripts.aw:build:dev: yarn set-io-arweave && REACT_APP_NONZONE_ENV='development' GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false yarn --cwd webapp build && yarn reset-io
scripts.aw:build:prod: yarn set-io-arweave && REACT_APP_NONZONE_ENV='production' GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false yarn --cwd webapp build && yarn reset-io

author: Non-Zone team
